Datasource.Parameter: (SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE landcover='forest') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE landcover='sparse') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE landcover='felling') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE landcover='felling_overgrown') AS t
(SELECT way, elevation, coalesce("deprecated:contour-width", 'nul') as width FROM planet_osm_line WHERE relief='contour') AS t
(SELECT st_simplify(way, 100) as way, elevation FROM planet_osm_line WHERE relief='contour' AND "deprecated:contour-width"='major') AS t
(SELECT way, coalesce("deprecated:contour-width", 'nul') as width FROM planet_osm_line WHERE relief='hatch') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE relief='cliff') AS t
(SELECT way FROM planet_osm_line WHERE relief='ravine') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE passability IS NOT NULL) AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE landcover='urban') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE landcover='rural') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE landcover='cottage') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE landcover='restricted') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE landcover='cemetry') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE river IS NOT NULL) AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE swamp IS NOT NULL) AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='gasline') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='powerline') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='powerline_major') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='abandoned') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='cutting_wide') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='trench') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='wall') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='cutting') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='path') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='dirt' AND drive IS NOT NULL) AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='dirt' AND drive IS NULL) AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='advanced' AND drive IS NOT NULL) AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='advanced' AND drive IS NULL) AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='asphalt') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='major') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='highway') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='asphalt') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='major') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='highway') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='dirt') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='railway') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE landcover='water') AS t
(SELECT (ST_Dump(ST_Union(way))).geom as way FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE landcover='water') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE border='fence') AS t
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE border='forest') AS t
(SELECT way, bridge, ST_Length(ST_MakeLine(ST_StartPoint(way), ST_EndPoint(way))) as length FROM planet_osm_line WHERE bridge IS NOT NULL) AS t

(SELECT ends.end as way, ST_Azimuth(ends.dir, ends.end) / pi() * 180 as angle, bridge FROM (SELECT way, ST_StartPoint(way) as end, bridge, ST_PointN(way, 2) as dir FROM planet_osm_line WHERE bridge IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT way, ST_EndPoint(way) as end, bridge, ST_PointN(way, ST_NPoints(way) - 1) as dir FROM planet_osm_line WHERE bridge IS NOT NULL) AS ends) AS t

(SELECT p.way, p.name, ST_Azimuth( ST_Line_Interpolate_Point(l.way, GREATEST(ST_Line_Locate_Point(l.way, p.way) - 0.0001, 0)), ST_Line_Interpolate_Point(l.way, LEAST(ST_Line_Locate_Point(l.way, p.way) + 0.0001, 1))) / pi() * 180 AS angle from (SELECT * FROM planet_osm_point WHERE poi='railway_station') as p LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road='railway') AS l ON ST_Intersects(p.way, l.way)) as t

(SELECT p.way, p.name, ST_Azimuth( ST_Line_Interpolate_Point(l.way, GREATEST(ST_Line_Locate_Point(l.way, p.way) - 0.0001, 0)), ST_Line_Interpolate_Point(l.way, LEAST(ST_Line_Locate_Point(l.way, p.way) + 0.0001, 1))) / pi() * 180 AS angle from (SELECT * FROM planet_osm_point WHERE poi='pedestrain_tunel') as p LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE road in ('highway', 'major', 'asphalt')) AS l ON ST_Intersects(p.way, l.way)) as t
(SELECT ST_PointOnSurface(way) as way, name FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE landcover='cottage') AS t
(SELECT ST_PointOnSurface(way) as way, name FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE landcover='restricted') AS t
